title: What if Yasuo's Wind Wall cost him his Flow?
body:
Title. Just an idea. His shield, a defensive ability, expends his Flow when full. Why not have Wind Wall, another defensive ability, expend whatever Flow he currently has? This gives Yasuo a consequence to using it other than it going on cooldown. Maybe it'll even give him a bit of buffing room.

___

**EDIT:** I don't know where people are getting the idea that this is a Yasuo hate thread or something. I love Yasuo, he's one of my favorite champions. This is merely an idea that popped into my head after reading a couple recent threads about his Wind Wall, so I threw it out here onto the boards to start a discussion. I think it would be a fair change and _gives Riot room to buff him_. I agree that he's actually a bit underpowered right now but you all have to understand that there's reasons for that. One of the big factors being his Wind Wall being so useful seeing as it  _stops all projectiles for free._ Yes, it does have a long cooldown, and again, there's a reason for that.

replies.body:
I think the duration would last as long as the amount of flow he used. At max flow it would grant his current 4 or so seconds. If he was at 25% flow obviously it would be 1 second. Just implement an equation based on the percent of flow he expends into seconds. 

However with that they would probably buff his flow generation rate by a little as he moves to account for losing it upon casting the wall.

Edit: This would mean that no matter what flow he is at he could still instacast it to keep his trademark flashy skillshot outplays like absorbing a jinx rocket last second, even at like 3 flow it would last like .05 seconds, enough to save him no matter what flow he has. This keeps it from ever being a deadweight, useless skill.
I like that. Makes using it require a bit more skill, and it's already a pretty reactionary ability in the first place
if this is to be done they would buff other stats but this is most likely not happening
If that were to happen the total duration at 100 flow would have to be raised since you can't expect him to wall everytime at 100 flow.... I would say the total should be around 6 sec

They could also make it cost only a fraction of his current or max flow.

Example:
Cost: Current flow, up to 50% of maximum. Duration: 1 second per 12.5% of maximum flow used. (Minimum 1)

This would make it so that Yasuo gets less effect if his shield has recently been used, but keeps him from always needing to blow (heh) an absurd amount of his shield on a wall with a decent duration.

As always, you can play around with values for balance. Up to 40% and 1s per 10% used also sounds good to me.

I like this whole idea as it gives Yasuo a decision at maximum flow. Do I stop the incoming projectiles outright, or can I let my shield absorb it and save my W for an emergency 2 seconds later?
